columns.name: aircraft_id
columns.description: Unique aircraft identifier used across datasets.

columns.name: tail_number
columns.description: Aircraft registration/tail number visible on the fuselage.

columns.name: model
columns.description: Aircraft model name or code (e.g., A320-214).

columns.name: manufacturer
columns.description: Aircraft manufacturer (e.g., Airbus, Boeing).

columns.name: engine_model
columns.description: Installed engine model family (e.g., CFM56-5B).

columns.name: first_service_dt
columns.description: Date when the aircraft entered commercial service.

columns.name: status
columns.description: Current operational status (e.g., Active, Maintenance, Retired).

columns.name: cycles_total
columns.description: Total takeoff-landing cycles accumulated by the aircraft.

columns.name: hours_total
columns.description: Total flight hours accumulated by the aircraft.

columns.name: reading_id
columns.description: Unique identifier of the sensor reading record.

columns.name: aircraft_id
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the aircraft associated with the reading.

columns.name: event_ts
columns.description: UTC timestamp when the reading was captured.

columns.name: engine_pos
columns.description: Engine position on the wing or tail (e.g., 1 = left, 2 = right).

columns.name: phase_of_flight
columns.description: Flight phase label for the reading (Taxi, Takeoff, Cruise, etc.).

columns.name: altitude_ft
columns.description: Pressure altitude at the time of the reading (feet).

columns.name: ias_kts
columns.description: Indicated airspeed at the time of the reading (knots).

columns.name: egt_c
columns.description: Exhaust gas temperature measured by engine sensors (Â°C).

columns.name: fuel_flow_kg_h
columns.description: Estimated fuel flow rate at the time of reading (kg/h).

columns.name: vib_ips
columns.description: Engine vibration level (inches per second, IPS).

columns.name: event_id
columns.description: Unique identifier of the maintenance event.

columns.name: aircraft_id
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the affected aircraft.

columns.name: event_ts
columns.description: UTC timestamp when the maintenance event occurred.

columns.name: event_type
columns.description: Type/category of maintenance (Inspection, A-Check, Unscheduled, etc.).

columns.name: ata_chapter
columns.description: ATA chapter code indicating the system/component involved (e.g., 72).

columns.name: defect_code
columns.description: Internal defect or fault code reported by maintenance.

columns.name: severity
columns.description: Event severity classification (Low, Medium, High, Critical).

columns.name: grounded
columns.description: Indicates whether the aircraft was grounded (AOG) due to the event.

columns.name: workorder_id
columns.description: Identifier of the maintenance work order from MRO/ERP.

columns.name: duration_min
columns.description: Total duration of the maintenance action (minutes).

columns.name: description
columns.description: Free-text, short description of the event or action taken.

columns.name: next_due_cycles
columns.description: Cycles remaining until the next scheduled maintenance.

columns.name: next_due_hours
columns.description: Flight hours remaining until the next scheduled maintenance.

columns.name: reading_id
columns.description: Unique reading identifier (joins to fact_engine_sensor.reading_id).

columns.name: sensor_type
columns.description: Type of sensor reading (IAS, ALT, OAT).

columns.name: unit
columns.description: Measurement unit associated to sensor_type.

columns.name: quality_flag
columns.description: Quality status for the reading (OK/SUSPECT/BAD).

columns.name: source_system
columns.description: Source system of the reading (ACMS/FDR).

columns.name: calibration_version
columns.description: Calibration bundle version if applicable.

columns.name: reading_ts
columns.description: Timestamp of the reading (UTC).

columns.name: phase_key
columns.description: Normalized key for phase of flight (e.g., CLIMB).

columns.name: phase_name
columns.description: Human-readable phase name.

columns.name: category
columns.description: ground | air

columns.name: exp_ias_min_kts
columns.description: Expected IAS min for this phase (kts).

columns.name: exp_ias_max_kts
columns.description: Expected IAS max for this phase (kts).

columns.name: exp_alt_min_ft
columns.description: Expected altitude min for this phase (ft).

columns.name: exp_alt_max_ft
columns.description: Expected altitude max for this phase (ft).

columns.name: description
columns.description: Short description of the phase.
